Package dr.math

Interface Summary
IntegrableUnivariateFunction  
Integral An interface for integration of univariate functions.
MFWithGradient interface for a function of several variables with a gradient
MinimiserMonitor interface for a classes that wish to monitor the progress of a Minimiser

Class Summary
BFloat BFloat -- floats with added buoyancy Implements numbers with precision equal to floats, and range roughly 1.0e-K ...
BigDecimalUtils Several useful BigDecimal mathematical functions.
Binomial Binomial coefficients
BoundsCheckedFunction returns a very large number instead of the function value if arguments are out of bound (useful for minimization with minimizers that don't check argument boundaries)
ComplexArray  
CompoundFunction interface for a function of one variable
ConjugateDirectionSearch methods for minimization of a real-valued function of several variables without using derivatives - algorithm is based on Brent's modification of a conjugate direction search method proposed by Powell (praxis) Richard P.
ConjugateGradientSearch minimization of a real-valued function of several variables using a the nonlinear conjugate gradient method where several variants of the direction update are available (Fletcher-Reeves, Polak-Ribiere, Beale-Sorenson, Hestenes-Stiefel) and bounds are respected.
DifferentialEvolution global minimization of a real-valued function of several variables without using derivatives using a genetic algorithm Price, K., and R.
EmpiricalBayesPoissonSmoother  
ErrorFunction error function and related stuff
FastFourierTransform Performs FFT on vectors with lengths equaling powers-of-2
GammaFunction gamma function
KroneckerOperation A class that implements the Kronecker product and Kronecker sum matrix operations
LineFunction converts a multivariate function into a univariate function
LogTricks  
MachineAccuracy determines machine accuracy
MathUtils Handy utility functions which have some Mathematical relavance.
MersenneTwisterFast MersenneTwisterFast:

A simulation quality fast random number generator (MT19937) with the same public methods as java.util.Random.

MultivariateMinimum abstract base class for minimisation of a multivariate function
